storyInfo: As planned, 'Roy the Lazurite' is about to get a face transplant and say goodbye to his old self. In the final moments of his old identity, Roy meets two young men also struggling to survive in Kazimierz's biggest city.

attributes.content: Why do I want to join the Armorless Union?
What a weird question. This is your organization, old man. What's there to explain?
So, does this count as my interview? I heard all the companies around town do stuff like this now. Are we going to interview every new recruit from now on? Should I start calling you 'Boss'?
Stop being such a pain in the ass.
The way I see it, there's no difference between a hitman agency and any other business. Show up to work, do some overtime, then make that someone else's problem.
If I had to give you a reason, then it's probably for the extra cash. Sure as hell beats what I make from hunting fowlbeasts.
It's the same stuff anyways—you aim, you shoot. Of course the higher paying job's gonna motivate you more.
Isn't that right, boss? After all, everyone just wants to live the good life.
The Armorless Union's hitmen. How did you people find this place?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Does that really matter at this point?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Celebrities such as yourself naturally attract attention with their every move.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: While you've done your due diligence, good sir, how should I put this... We're hardly the only ones who can track you down.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: There are plenty of people who have it in for you. Beating them all to the punch was no small feat.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Time is of the essence. I do hope you can trust our good intentions.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: ...Trust you?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: The Armorless Union, speaking to me of trust? If that's a joke, I'm not laughing.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: When necessary, we are also capable of NOT being Armorless Union.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Hitman, is this the reason you sent your subordinates to die by my hand?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Are you planning to—
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Shh. Some things are better kept to yourself.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: A man as wise as you surely understands this.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Do us a little favor, and you'll earn yourself an out. It's a pretty good deal if you ask me.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: You scratch our back, we scratch yours. So how about it?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: The Armorless Union's Lazurite rank. How about it? Sounds pretty powerful, doesn't it?
Honestly, the pay isn't half-bad either. In a way, it's not too different from being a competition knight. You earn your keep by putting your life on the line.
You don't get paid the big bucks without taking a few risks, right?
That said, after more than a decade in the business, it's time to hang up the hat.
'Quit while you're ahead.' The simplest truth to live by. Why swim against the current of the era? There are more stable sources of income, so why burn your life away?
Bring your ship back to port when the time's right.
How could being someone else's underling possibly feel as good as being your own boss?
The surgery is scheduled in two hours. Be sure to show up on time.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Starting tomorrow, your new name will be Joel Tyrell. And in two days, the company will put in a word for us, so don't mess it up.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Also... the General Chamber's people don't seem to completely buy that we died along with the Blood Knight. Not yet, anyway.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Tch, the Armorless Union is already preparing to select the next Lazurites before the investigators have even left.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: In other words, lay low and spare us any unnecessary trouble until this all blows over.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: ...Hey, are you even listening?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Huh? Oh, yes, of course.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Ma'am, I'd like to have the most expensive meal set.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: No need for a bag, I'll be eating here. Oh, and make it extra spicy, please!
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Okay, so what were you saying, Monique?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: ...Go die in a ditch.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: What an awful thing to say. Why, if I died, poor Mrs. Tyrell would end up a widow—
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: She sure hung up fast.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: (Seems like everything's going smoothly. Even if the Board of Directors has its doubts, it's already too late. As for the Blood Knight... If he knows what's good for him, he'll keep his head down and not make a mess of things.)
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: (After all, everyone is too busy looking out for number one. Nobody will lose sleep over a couple of 'tools' going missing.)
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: (I probably don't have to worry about Darksteel either. All that's left is a face transplant and a new identity...)
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: (Guess I'll be kissing goodbye to this handsome mug then.)
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: (Who knows how I'll look when it's done, but somehow I doubt I'll be quite as gorgeous.)
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: (Alas, what a pity.)
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: The former Lazurite stands on the street, concealed beneath the shadows of the neon lights.
He lifts his hands to pat his cheeks while aimlessly looking out at the bright city lights.
The most recent news highlights are being broadcast on the big screen on the side of a skyscraper.
All the other screens dotting the cityscape, large and small, play roughly the same thing, their clashing noises and flashing lights enough to make one a bit dizzy.

The Blood Knight was attacked by unknown assailants in his secluded countryside home. There were traces of an intense struggle, and it has been confirmed that the blood left at the scene belongs to the former champion himself.
attributes.name: Television

attributes.content: The bodies of the attackers were also found at the scene.
attributes.name: Television

attributes.content: Experts have commented that it is highly unlikely that the Blood Knight survived such a fierce battle, which is consistent with the large quantities of blood found.
attributes.name: Television

attributes.content: The leading theory at the moment is that our former champion, weakened after his battle with the Radiant Knight, exhausted the last of his strength and passed away along with his assailants.
attributes.name: Television

attributes.content: For more information, please stay tuned to our follow-up program! The truth behind the attack on the Blood Knight!
attributes.name: Television

attributes.content: Those bastards! What 'truth'? It's all a bunch of baloney!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: How could the Blood Knight be defeated by mere assassins? Not a chance in hell! He's probably just laying low because he doesn't want those media bloodsuckers bothering him over an injury! They only care about the next scoop!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: And damn the whole lot of those shameless murderers! Gutter-dwelling pests! The Blood Knight would never go down like this!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Calm down, you can say what you want, just stop flailing your arms like— Yowch, that's my head!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: S-Sorry, I got a bit too worked up there. You alright?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Gaah... I'm fine... I guess this just isn't my lucky day.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Hey, you over there! Yeah, you! You didn't get hit, did you?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: You alright, man? He didn't hit you in the head too?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Uh... Huh? Sorry, err, were you talking to me?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Who else is there? There's only the three of us squatting by the food stall in the middle of the night.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Hmm, I suppose so. I appreciate the concern, but I'm fine. I was just in shock after hearing the news.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: The news is nothing but a load of shit!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Those carrion-lickers only care about the scent of blood and death. They don't give a damn about whether the Blood Knight lives or dies. They don't know a goddamn thing, which is why they can run their mouths like that!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: 'After being defeated by the Radiant Knight, the former champion yada yada!'
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Tsk tsk. As long as you pick a good clickbait title, you can easily farm a few days' worth of ad revenue. No one with a bit of curiosity can resist. It's just the latest way to make a quick buck these past two days.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: He shouldn't be this... this token of consumerism!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Well said. You're exactly right.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Our company does some business with the knight competitions. I ran into him a few times while following the project, but our holdings went down the drain as soon as the news came out.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: *sigh*... Personally, I'm a big fan, so I hope he's alright.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: ...Hmph. That's more than enough reason to treat you to a drink then!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: I mean, as an apology for what just happened.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: How about it? Or are you too scared to have a drink with an Infected?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: But I have work tomorrow...
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Well, whatever. I'll cross that bridge when I get to it.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: You pick the place then.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Heh, I like your guts. How about you then? Wanna all go together?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Actually, I have some things I need to attend to soon—
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: ...Still, fate has brought us together, and kindness is hard to find these days. So, why not? Lead the way.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Great! Follow me!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Pwah! Cheers!
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Cheers!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: ...Wrap it up, you two. I'm not made of money, you know.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Actually, uhh, I recognize you. You're the one who competed today, that, uhh—
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Ironwrist Knight!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Wow, I can't believe I got my head smacked by Ironwrist Knight's iron wrist...
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Ahahaha! That's gotta be worth at least a point!
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: C'mon, I already apologized, didn't I?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Ahh!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Too bad about today, you almost got the win. If only the other side didn't get that supply pack!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: I bet on you, you know!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: ...Really? Why would you do that?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Because the odds were good. Why else?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Oh... Makes sense...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: But just so you know, you shouldn't bet on Infected knights next time. They won't let us win.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: I gave it my all, but still failed. I doubt the people behind the scenes are very happy with me, after my last showing.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Woah, that sounds awful.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: If only I had the Blood Knight's skills...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: He still lost to the Radiant Knight though. Er, sorry, shouldn't have brought that up.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: By the way, what do YOU do?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Are you some sort of knight too?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Nothing of the sort. I'm just a hunter from the sticks who occasionally stops by the big city. I usually hunt fowlbeasts, and can sometimes even turn a profit if they manage to fetch a good price.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: But it's been rough these days, so I've been thinking about how to make it big in the city.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Like becoming a competition knight? You can make a lot of quick cash if you manage to win.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Nah, forget it. I don't have what it takes to be a knight anyway.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I'm no good at fighting.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: You've got a good head on your shoulders then. The knight competitions may be glamorous, but only a small handful of us make any real money. Not the kind of thing you want to be worrying about.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Heck, I wouldn't be doing this either, if I had a choice.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Life has a way of messing with us all, brother.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: You said it. Back then, all I ever thought about was how much better life would be in the big city.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: If I could go back in time, I'd tell myself from a few years back to just forget about Kawalerielki. Should've stayed home and worked an honest job.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: I'd rather spend my entire life farming than... doing whatever I'm doing now.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Agreed, only a tiny minority are able to make good money.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: But even then, what the best paid competition knight earns is nothing compared to the real profit that the companies behind them are making... *hic*.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: You've had too much to drink, my man.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Naww, I'm totally sober!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Whaddya think... If I get infected, you think I'll get the day off tomorrow?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Maybe. But forget tomorrow, you'll never have to go to work again.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Just pretend I didn't say anything... *hic*. Damn, maybe I am drunk after all.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Sorry, my head's starting... to spin...
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Fine. Seems like you really are out of it, so I'll restrain myself and not beat the shit out of you.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Just don't ever crack a joke like that again... 'Cause if you do, you're taking a trip to the hospital to get stitches for your nose.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Eep... It won't happen again.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: To be honest, I always wanted to be a knight, ever since I was a little kid.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Not a competition knight, mind you. Something much older... The kind my grandpa's generation really looked up to.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: You mean like those campaign knights that entered the city not too long ago?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Yeah, I know I don't have the skills for that... *sigh*.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Look at it this way, their way of fighting is totally outdated. What can you accomplish these days with brute strength alone?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Sure, nobody's arguing with that. But... We've got to fight, like it or not.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Phew... Boss, pour me another one!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: If you ask me, everyone wants a better life. And the best way to do that is to get into business.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: You want to get into the business world?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Uh, yeah, I guess? Preferably a large corporation. The nine-to-five, cubicle sort. But y'know, being a salesman doesn't sound half-bad either. I think I'd be pretty good at it.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I heard big companies give bonuses to outstanding employees too. What could be better than earning a stable salary?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Haha, when you put it like that...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: You're too naive!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Working in a corporation isn't as easy as you think.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Hmm... Well, it's just a pipe dream anyway. Everyone knows it's tough getting into a good company.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: True, it's tough, but that's still the easy part. Getting in is just the beginning.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: The problem is, once you're in, you can't get out. That's the hard part.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Today, I... actually ditched work. I didn't show up.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: I originally wanted to take some time off, but I'm out of vacation days for the year, so I didn't even bother applying.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: You were gone the whole day and nobody even bothered to call you?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: My phone's dead. Forgot to charge it last night.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Good man.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Are you sure that's not going to be a problem?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: It's a problem all right. A big problem.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: ...Scratch what I said earlier. Maybe you're a little TOO gutsy.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Hah... Haha... Is this what you'd call having guts?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: My tongue's completely numb, my stomach's empty, and my brain's faring about as well.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Err, no, I just drank a whole bunch, so there's alcohol in my stomach and water in my head.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: What the hell are you on about?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Quite the unique saying you came up with there. I like it.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: That said, I feel pretty good now that I can't hear my ringtone... At least I can fool myself into thinking everything's fine.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: With all due respect, that feeling won't last forever.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: As soon as you charge your phone... Sheesh, I don't even want to think about it.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: ...Then let's not. I'm starting to get the chills again.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Even I'm starting to feel sick to my stomach.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Whatever, I've made my peace with it. There's no shortage of grunts like me. You've got the more experienced old hands, and the more gung-ho young guns. No point delaying the inevitable.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: I'm just worn out, man... I just wanna take a day off where I don't have to worry about anything.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: If I'm really gonna get fired over this, then so be it. At least that spares me from all the agonizing over not being able to make up my mind.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: You really do have nerves of steel. You're not afraid at all?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: ...Can't you tell I'm joking? Of course I'm afraid. I still haven't paid off my mortgage.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: So I'm gonna head home and pull an all-nighter writing a report for the head of the department about how I was in a coma all day from a serious illness, and accidentally broke my phone.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: That... might be a bit of a stretch.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Just a bit.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Who cares if it's true or not? All that matters is having an excuse to step down.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Alright, that's enough for today. No more drinking.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Boss, give me the tab... Tch, you two sure know how to take advantage of a guy's hospitality. Picking all the expensive drinks, eh?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: I do appreciate it. Ahh, what a rare treat, to enjoy a friend's hospitality on one of my few trips to the city.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: To show my thanks, can I offer you a suggestion?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: What, me?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Why don't you spend the night here at the bar? I took a look and it's going to be open all night, with plenty of customers.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: And tomorrow morning, find another place with lots of people. Try to keep your head down in the crowd.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Huh? What's that supposed to mean?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: That's all I have to say. I'll be off now.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: He's gone just like that, huh? Didn't even care to elaborate.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Well, I'd better get going too. What about you? Are you going to listen to him and drink all night?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Later, the old man told me that he's a Darksteel, and that I might be cut out to become a Lazurite.
He may have been as cold and shady as his rank, but I don't think there's anything particularly blue about me. Oh, not that I'm trying to argue with you, boss. Lazurite suits me just fine.
When the old man picked me up—well, I won't say that, since I was doing perfectly fine by myself and didn't need to be 'picked up.'
Basically, I had just hunted two fowlbeasts at the time. Scalded off the plumage, bled them out, and had them ready for eating after some time over the fire pit.
They came out pretty good, and the old man ate a fowlbeast and a half all by himself. Left me with two heads, a pair of claws, and one leg.
After he finished, he started talking like one of those high-and-mighty folks out of the storybooks:
Even without a teacher or any tools, you're still able to hunt these slippery fowlbeasts. They can be difficult even for experienced hunters your age. You've got a natural talent.
How about it, child? Want to live the good life?
—Of course. How could I not?
I must've been drunk as hell too. Ended up wasting all that time because I somehow believed what he said.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: The sun's almost up... Better start heading back.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Ugh... It's so cold.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: So this is what Kawalerielki looks like at this hour. There's hardly anyone around, the trash everywhere hasn't been cleaned up yet, and there are discarded knight posters all over the ground.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Hah, people are all trash...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: —Who's there?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: You people are...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Ironwrist Knight.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Assassin

attributes.content: By refusing to cooperate with the General Chamber, you've impeded the path for others.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Assassin

attributes.content: The Blood Knight can no longer protect you.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Assassin

attributes.content: This whole deal with pawning my life off to them... The more time passes, the more I see things clearly.

The knights are commodities they hoard inside their warehouses. The assassins are weapons they wield. And what of public opinion? It's their best tool for manipulation, and they've studied it thoroughly.
Money and power. In Kazimierz, these two things are often inextricably linked.
Hey, I'm not saying you have to become a tycoon or anything, but look, if you want to live a better life, you have to rub shoulders with those people.
Most people are fine climbing over others, one rung at a time. But when will you ever be free from someone else's control?
So just don't think about it too much. If you're privileged enough, just try to live a better, more comfortable life.

At least now, I won't be asked to take someone's life over the phone anymore. If something goes wrong, getting hurt is the least of our worries. We'll need a good excuse to pull the wool over the boss's eyes, right?
Alright, you can open your eyes now. You look fine.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: ...Nngh...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: If you keep stroking your face like that, I'm going to make you need another one.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Egads, Monique. I shudder at the thought.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Having bandages all over my face is... Hmm, how should I put this, new and exciting?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Donna. Donna Tyrell. And you're Joel Tyrell.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: You'd better not mess it up again after the doctor comes back.
attributes.name: Donna

attributes.content: Oh right, our titles have changed too. We're husband and wife now, right?
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: Oh, are you blushing?
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: Did they carve out your eyeballs?
attributes.name: Donna

attributes.content: No need to be so hostile. While this arrangement might be a bit... Mm, well, it's fine.
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: Oh, and don't worry, you're just as easy on the eyes as before.
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: ...So they definitely carved out your eyeballs.
attributes.name: Donna

attributes.content: I see you're awake now. How are you doing?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: You chose to go with the accelerated program. Though Originium Arts can speed up the process so you won't need multiple surgeries, there are still corresponding risks.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: You won't be able to remove the bandages for a while, and I'd suggest returning for a follow-up once a month to ensure the most stable results.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Thank you. I feel great already.
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: But I don't think the follow-ups will be necessary.
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: Urk...
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: We'll figure something out on our own. Thank you for your hard work, doctor.
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: That was sudden. You're gonna have to figure out how to get rid of the body on your own.
attributes.name: Donna

attributes.content: I didn't have a choice. Nobody can be allowed to know about this. I could've chosen my words better, but I meant what I said.
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: Dead men tell no tales.
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: By the way, did you hear about what the General Chamber did to a group of Infected knights who had been following the Blood Knight?
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: I ran into one of 'em last night, just to make sure.
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: I've heard a thing or two. But it's none of my business.
attributes.name: Donna

attributes.content: And I suggest you keep your shiny new nose out of it too. Don't forget, we've got nothing to do with the Armorless Union now.
attributes.name: Donna

attributes.content: Heh, I suppose you're right.
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: It's none of our business now.
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: Alright, then we're about to start a brand new chapter of our lives. What's the plan? If we're going to sell stuff... are we really going to run a business?
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: Even if you wanted to, Darksteel would never let you.
attributes.name: Donna

attributes.content: It'd already be a miracle if you didn't scare off all our customers.
attributes.name: Donna

attributes.content: Please, do I even have the talent to mess anything up? We have everything we could ever want now, but I still need something to kill the time.
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: You've got time to kill?
attributes.name: Donna

attributes.content: Kind of. You in the mood to go hunting, just the two of us? We can go buy a villa out in the countryside. I'll teach you how to hunt fowlbeasts—nobody's better than me.
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: Ha, hunting for sport. Never could've imagined that back when I was scraping by in the woods.
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: I've simply never had the free time. But now I've got nothing BUT free time, so I might as well treat myself.
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: Seems like all that free time fried your brain then. You can go by yourself.
attributes.name: Donna

attributes.content: I'm going on vacation, preferably some place nice like Dossoles or Siesta. You won't catch me dead in the boonies.
attributes.name: Donna

attributes.content: Seriously, after all the work it took to make this day possible, you're just reminiscing about your childhood?
attributes.name: Donna

attributes.content: What are you planning?
attributes.name: Donna

attributes.content: ...Honestly, who knows?
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: If I can live a better life, I'll try to do exactly that. No need to sweat the details.
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: ...If your brain malfunctions and you decide to go live in a cave or whatever, you might as well transfer all your assets to me first. I'll send you my bank account number when we get back.
attributes.name: Donna

attributes.content: Haha, if something happens to me, you'd inherit everything I own anyway, just from our legal status.
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: Good point. Might as well speed up the process then.
attributes.name: Donna

attributes.content: How cruel. Anyway, enough of that. After I tie up some loose ends, how about we go on that vacation I suggested? Give it a thought, alright?
attributes.name: Joel

attributes.content: Wherever you decide to go, why not make it a team effort?
attributes.name: Joel
